tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SurgerySchedule (
  surgery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  surgery_date DATE,
  surgery_type VARCHAR(50),
  patient_id INT,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100),
  surgeon_id INT,
  surgeon_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE robot_surgeries (
    surgery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    surgery_type VARCHAR(50),
    patient_id INT,
    scheduled_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE patient_consultations (
    consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    consultant_doctor VARCHAR(50),
    consultation_date TIMESTAMP,
    consultation_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Appointments ( 
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  patient_id INT NOT NULL, 
  surgeon_id INT NOT NULL, 
  room_id INT NOT NULL, 
  appointment_date DATE NOT NULL, 
  appointment_time TIME NOT NULL, 
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id), 
  FOREIGN KEY (surgeon_id) REFERENCES Surgeons(surgeon_id), 
  FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES OperatingRooms(room_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE Consultations ( 
  consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  patient_id INT NOT NULL, 
  surgeon_id INT NOT NULL, 
  consultation_date DATE NOT NULL, 
  consultation_time TIME NOT NULL, 
  consultation_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
  consultation_notes TEXT, 
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id), 
  FOREIGN KEY (surgeon_id) REFERENCES Surgeons(surgeon_id) 
);
